messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling Cult
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/6/2003 1:23:24 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... South Carolina.  Denim jumpers (with tie-dye tee-shirts.) Secrets: We have happy, cool kids.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/6/2003 1:23:24 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> And if it's a cult, where do we meet? What are we wearing? What are our
> secrets and how are we recruiting?
>
>

South Carolina. Denim jumpers (with tie-dye tee-shirts.)

Secrets: We have happy, cool kids. And we don't have to fight about homework.

Recruiting at La Leche League meetings and other places all over the place.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
